Articles.Content: Are you ready to meet Valentina? Here she is! **Edited February 21, 2015 by KasperVld** high res image

![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

(5chr)
KSP 1.0 is on it's way!!
Eyebrows... ehhh, not a huge fan, but all the power to Squad for implementing female Kerbals!

I'm extremely happy with how Valentina turned out, especially the rounded jaw and eyelashes - feminine yet not overly-sexualised.

Bravo, SQUAD!

> 
> Eyebrows... ehhh, not a huge fan, but all the power to Squad for implementing female Kerbals!

Eyelashes, not eyebrows.

I like it. Still looks like a kerbal though looks more feminine than Jeb/Bill/Bob

That pose makes her look...peppy.

I feel like I should do a barrel roll just looking at her.

Love it!!!!!

Thank you so much!

Interesting...

Its not how I expected it, but it's still good.
Pretty much awesome, good job!
Nice! I am excited to see the other female kerbals. Or are you leaving it with one among all the others?

> 
> Nice! I am excited to see the other female kerbals. Or are you leaving it with one among all the others?

Just like the guys, there will be one model for the female Kerbonauts ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hooray! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Having only male kerbals always seemed weird. By the way, I notice she has an orange suit: will she replace one of the original trio?

-Duxwing
Love it. Glad to see they didn't go overboard with the "feminization". Looks great and I'd trust her exactly as much as I'd trust Jebediah to pilot my rocket (make of that what you will...).

> 
> Just like the guys, there will be one model for the female Kerbonauts ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Ah, ok thx 4 the quick response. 

Anyway - great job! Peppy and truely badass. I love it!
O frabjous day! Callooh! callay!

> 
> Just like the guys, there will be one model for the female Kerbonauts ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I suppose people can use that mod which gives the Kerbonauts different hairstyles and even facial hair. Don't know which mod it is though.

So the main face structure is basically like [Hayoo](http://www.spaceflightonline.net/images/kerbals.jpg) suggested. I like it very much. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I approve. Good job Squad!
Yup. Definitely a success. She looks like a fearless, rather excitable badass. Congratulations on creating a great addition to the mascots!

You certainly have invested many discussion- and working hours into this project.

Very well done. SheÃ‚Â´s fantastic.![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Well done guys, bang up job!

I had to do this, as I've seen it's [already started](https://i.imgflip.com/hwyd3.jpg).

![valentina_separator_lw.png](http://s30.postimg.org/6m5bo3jcx/valentina_separator_lw.png)

> 
> I had to do this, as I've seen it's [already started](https://i.imgflip.com/hwyd3.jpg).
> [http://s30.postimg.org/6m5bo3jcx/valentina_separator_lw.png](http://s30.postimg.org/6m5bo3jcx/valentina_separator_lw.png)

That's mean. But also hilarious. Better make it a greysuit though so it's not about Valentina Kerman herself.

![VlDwzrA.png](http://i.imgur.com/VlDwzrA.png)

There we go.

We never had any spinoff memes about specific Kerbals, and we are sure as heck not gonna start now!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-21T02:36:18Z" title="02/21/2015 02:36  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 21, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**
Not bad, is that a bun hair style though? So she will join the original 4?
